Software Engineer with 10 years of experience. I own two masters in computer science, from a french and a german university. I started my career working in the enterprise software division at HP, and then I moved to consumer apps. I worked for a few years at Twitter solving scalability issues in the infrastructure team. I am now working at Blablacar on the backend of a carpooling app for daily commute.
